products.name: Apollo A7L Spacesuit Gloves
products.description: The gloves worn by astronauts during the Apollo program were an integral part of the A7L spacesuit.

products.name: Z-2 Spacesuit Gloves
products.description: The Z-2 spacesuit gloves are a prototype currently being developed by NASA for use on future missions to Mars.

products.name: Orlan Space Suit Gloves
products.description: The Orlan space suit gloves are a Russian-made used for spacewalks outside the International Space Station.

products.name: XEMU Spacesuit Gloves
products.description: The XEMU spacesuit gloves are a prototype being developed by SpaceX for use on future missions to Mars.
